name: Improved Healing Wave
baseDescription: Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.1 sec.

name: Tidal Focus
baseDescription: Reduces the mana cost of your healing spells by 1%.

name: Improved Reincarnation
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by 10 min and increases the amount of health and mana you reincarnate with by an additional 10%.

name: Ancestral Healing
baseDescription: Increases your target's armor value by 5% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.

name: Totemic Focus
baseDescription: Reduces the mana cost of your totems by 5%.

name: Nature's Guidance
baseDescription: Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by 1%.

name: Healing Focus
baseDescription: Gives you a 14% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.

name: Totemic Mastery
baseDescription: Increases the radius of your totems that affect friendly targets by 5 yards.

name: Healing Grace
baseDescription: Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by 5% and reduces the chance your healing spells will be dispelled by 10%.

name: Restorative Totems
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 5%.

name: Tidal Mastery
baseDescription: Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 1%.

name: Healing Way
baseDescription: Your Healing Wave spells have a 33% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 6% for 15 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Nature's Swiftness
baseDescription: When activated, your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

name: Purification
baseDescription: Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 2%.

name: Mana Tide Totem
baseDescription: Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec. The totem restores 6% of total mana every 3 seconds to group members within 20 yards.
